long_description: Hit the trail to happiness with the high-performance REI Endeavor men's shirt. It's a technical piece with a classic fit that's built to keep you comfortable so you can travel farther faster. Woven nylon/spandex fabric features 2-way stretch to enhance comfort while you're hiking, backpacking or climbing. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Lighweight fabric wicks moisture and dries fast to keep you cool; fabric resists both abrasion and wrinkling. Shoulder seams are placed where they won't chafe your skin under pack straps. Mesh panels discreetly placed under the arms increase ventilation. Sleeves roll up and secure with snap-closure tabs. Snap front placket can be easily adjusted with 1 hand while you're hiking. Chest pocket with welded zipper stashes trail and travel items. Classic fit. REI Endeavor shirt features an antimicrobial finish that helps control odors.
short_description: Hit the trail to happiness with the high-performance REI Endeavor men's shirt. It's a technical piece with a classic fit that's built to keep you comfortable so you can travel farther faster.
